message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $12,000. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $12,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to pay $9,000 for it. Can you meet me in the middle?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product is quite valuable to me. How about we settle at $10,500?
I appreciate your flexibility, but $10,500 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?
